channel.title: Unreal Engine on Martin MeRu
channel.description: Recent content in Unreal Engine on Martin MeRu

item.title: Adventure land in Unreal engine
item.description: Description: In this project, I created a population manager in Unity using genetic algorithms to navigate a maze. The project involved setting up a population of bots, breeding them, and evaluating their fitness in order to evolve a population that can successfully navigate a maze. Key Learnings: Creating a population manager in Unity using genetic algorithms Implementing fitness functions in genetic algorithms Managing data structures using lists in C# Applying good coding practices, such as commenting and using informative variable names Testing and experimenting with different parameters to fine-tune the genetic algorithm and improve the quality of the solutions it generates.
